# Dasar Ilmiah VALORIZE Learning

** Self-Determination Theory (SDT)**
Autonomy: Mahasiswa memilih Learning Needs dan tipe artefak 
Competence: Feedback informatif melalui peer review dan usage metrics 
Relatedness: Kontribusi visible ke knowledge commons 
** Cognitive Load Theory (CLT)**
Primitive Maps: Eksternalisasi struktur pengetahuan deklaratif 
Problem-Solving Maps: Visualisasi strategi procedural expert 
AI Scaffolding: Reduksi extraneous load, maksimasi germane load 
** Communities of Practice Theory**
Performance: Authentic artifact creation 
Recognition: Peer validation dan community impact metrics 
Competence: Progressive mastery melalui tiered assessment 
Hasil Meta-Analisis Pendukung:
Concept mapping meningkatkan STEM retention: d=0.60 
Concept mapping meningkatkan transfer: d=0.47 
Need satisfaction predicts engagement: r=0.52
